plugin.ctp.guides.title: LLM Guides
plugin.ctp.guides.subtitle: Download complete guides to create custom templates with an LLM
plugin.ctp.guides.intro: Each guide contains a complete, optimized prompt to copy and paste into a Large Language Model (like Claude, ChatGPT, or other AI assistants) to generate custom templates for Cimaise.
plugin.ctp.guides.step1: Download the guide for the type of template you want to create
plugin.ctp.guides.step2: Open the .txt file and copy the LLM prompt
plugin.ctp.guides.step3: Paste the prompt into your preferred LLM (Claude, ChatGPT, etc.)
plugin.ctp.guides.step4: Describe to the LLM what kind of template you want (style, layout, effects, etc.)
plugin.ctp.guides.step5: The LLM will generate all necessary files (metadata.json, template.twig, CSS, JS)
plugin.ctp.guides.step6: Compress the files into a ZIP and upload them through this interface
